Articles.Content:
Can anyone tell me why this rocket simple falls over sideways? It almost acts like the SAS is 90 degrees out of alignment...

[ATTACH]33870[/ATTACH]

I just don't see what is wrong with it...

Ughh.... I loaded up the craft file and it said it was incompatible with the current ksp version. Are you playing on a older version? If not try reuploading it. oh and i thought it was kinda neat that you live in missouri like me

Edit: I saw your other post saying you played on 0.13 so ill go and get that and figure out whats wrong with the rocket.

Edit 2: For Some reason i still cant it too load in 0.13 either it just takes me to the capsle selection

Edited September 29, 2012 by Tremzack

Maybe you could take a screenshot to show us, and then we could see what's wrong without going through the hassle of getting 0.13 again (and according to Tremzack, it doesn't work anyway). Screenshot button is F1.

I screwed up and lost all but the last two stages. So the question is moot. But I can at least tell you why it's taking you to the capsule selection. It's using a bunch of mod parts. Does the same thing to me if I try to open a .craft with parts from a mod I don't have. Also... How do I zoom out in the VAB? I've been trying to figure it out for DAYS.

If you have an numpad, it should be defaulted to Numpad - and Numpad + but if it's not and you want to change it to a key you want, go to the settings/options and look for the keyboard input section and you should find it there. It would still help if you could at least tell us what mods you have so we can get the ship and tell you what's wrong with it.

Otherwise, F1 is for screenshots.

Hope this helps.

Also... How do I zoom out in the VAB? I've been trying to figure it out for DAYS.

Hold down the middle mouse button and move the mouse up and down.
I mostly use the keyboard. Old habit from Mechwarrior 4. lol Plus my mouse kinda sucks.
